description:
Learn real-world applications for the concepts you learned in Introduction to
Networking. Continue to build your knowledge of networks and networking, with
detailed treatments of TCP/IP, how switches and routers operate, DNS, and
more. You'll gain a full understanding of almost every aspect of networking
technology, including hot topics such as virtual private networks, security,
Internet connectivity, and cloud computing. Completion of this course and its
prerequisite should serve as a springboard for a career in computer networking
or training for CCNA Certification.
title: Intermediate Networking
